Uses of Class
com.wizturn.sdk.peripheral.Peripheral

  • Packages that use Peripheral 
    Package Description
    com.wizturn.sdk.central
    Provides classes, interfaces necessary for being central role
    com.wizturn.sdk.central.task
    Provides tasks for changing, connecting, disconnecting, authenticating peripheral(Beacon)
    com.wizturn.sdk.connection
    Provides connection related classes, interfaces.
    com.wizturn.sdk.peripheral
    Provides classes, interfaces necessary for being peripheral role
